column2: We're surrounded! Three enemies!
We've been surrounded by three enemies... Strong ones!
They took us by surprise! These three are weak, but be careful!
Three enemies! We don't have time to waste!
Wh-- A surprise attack!? Four enemies!
Four enemies! They're formidable!
We're surrounded! They've got numbers... Wait for your chance!
We don't have time to hang around here fighting!
An enemy ambush! Let's see, there's... five of them!?
Five strong enemies...! We just have to take them one at a time!
Gah, shoot! They're weak, but they have us outnumbered! Hang on!
Don't panic! Stay cool, and blaze through them!
All right! The first move is ours!
Now's our chance to strike! Go!
This'll be over in a flash!
All right, we got the drop on them! Let's hit them hard!
Round them up and thrash them!
Don't bother with these guys! Just finish the job!
Move! You're in the way!
Let's beat them quick and go straight for our target!
OK, they're off balance!
Nice one! Keep it up!
You got them flinching! Go get them!
What!? This one's a real threat!
Hey that's a rare one! Don't let it escape!
One enemy! Let's do it!
One enemy, but it's pretty strong!
This'll be a cinch!
Now's not the time to stick around and fight!
There's two enemies! Don't underestimate them!
Two enemies! They're pretty strong!
Two weaklings! Beat 'em in one fell swoop!
We don't have time for these small fries! Clean 'em up!
Three enemies! Let's do it!
Three powerful foes! Stay on guard!
There's three of them, but we're the better team!
Tch, they caught us...! Let's thrash them!
Four foes! Don't lose here!
Four enemies here...! They're no pushovers!
Four enemies! Don't worry, though. They're still nothing special!
Multiple enemies! Rrgh, this is getting annoying!
Five foes! Just hang in there!
F-Five of them! And they're all really tough!
Outnumbering us isn't gonna help!
So, the enemy's on high alert...
Wh-What!? We've got several casualties! This is bad!
Joker!? H-Hey... Answer me!
How could they be this strong...?
Joker! Get up! No... JOKER!
Skull's out! We've gotta help him!
Gah... I got too reckless... I'll back out and focus on support!
Panther's been taken out! Someone treat her!
Fox is unconscious! This is bad!
Queen's injured! She needs some help!

Hey! You have to hang on, OK?
Everyone OK!?
Joker! Are you OK!?
Skull's in trouble! Someone fix him up!

Owww!

Crow's been knocked down! Stand your ground!
Hey! Are you OK!?
Whoa-ho! THAT'S how true phantom thieves do it!
All right, Joker! Very smooth!

Not bad, if I say so myself...

Good one, Fox!

Joker's terrified!

Joker's in despair! We can't just leave him like this!
Skull's losing heart! We have to save him!
